Description: Pottery vase of coarse straw tempered Nile silt, body tapering to point, now broken off, moderate shoulder and roll rim.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna (London, 1911), p. 21; pl. xxxiv.75. Like Rough ware R75 in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery. Marked H21 (e) on side.
Condition: fair (incomplete): reconstructed from pieces, one piece of body missing, tip of base missing..
